Packages 
Package Description
agents  
exception  
knowledge  
listener
Provides the necessary classes for defining a BWListener (see the GameListener class).
listeners
Provides the necessary classes for implementing various BWListeners (see the listeners.MlTrainingListener class).
ml
Provides the core implementation of the model and reinforcement learning algorithm used to micromanage units.
ml.actions  
ml.data
Provides the necessary classes for collecting and managing DataPoints (see the DataPoint class).
ml.learning
Provides the implementation of the SARSA learning algorithm (see the SARSA class) as well as the classes necessary to interact with the model.
ml.model  
ml.range
Provides the classes necessary to define various ranges from relevant data in combat scenarios.
ml.state
Provides the classes necessary to represent a State (see the State class) and other relevant objects.
planning  
planning.actions
